author: Kristina Chenault
text: "I ordered from here for the first time last night and I can say that it will be our last time. The only thing that was decent was the General Tso and even that is a stretch.\n\nWe also ordered two appetizers- the pork dumplings (soggy
column5: greasy
column6: and gross) and the crab rangoon (are you sure there's crab in there with that insane amount of cream cheese?). We also ordered the pad thai... It was the worst tasting pad thai I've ever had. Neither of us could stomach it.\n\nHow there are so many good reviews for this place is beyond me."

author: Hector Hernandez
text: 'Great place to stop in and get lunch. They have an outstanding assortment of lunch specials that will do everything but break the bank.  I myself went for the sesame chicken as itâ€™s my go-to take out order and the fried rice here is absolutely delicious. Consistent in flavor and texture throughout. The chicken was fried to perfection unlike the soggy mess you sometimes get in other places and the sauce did not disappoint. Itâ€™s right next to my work and Iâ€™ll certainly come back between shifts especially because service was so kind and quick.'

text: 'Nice vibes and very friendly service. The meals were crisp and enchanting. Will absolutely recommend this restaurant to anyone. Convenient rates and generous portions. Keep up the great work.'

author: Colin Dunn
text: "The prices are good and the food is standard. Small place with outdoor seating. Service was friendly. I had some GI issues after I went there. Not sure if it can be attributed to the food. Not sure if I'll go again."

author: Caitlin E.
text: "My go to sushi place in Hoboken/Weehawken. I always do take out but the restaurant inside is cute and there's outdoor seating.  Friendly staff and the sushi is always fresh & delicious. Delivery is so fast and pick up is quick too. Don't pass up this place
column5: it's great! Also they're on the forkcast app if you don't want to talk to a human.  Love yeung!!!"

author: Brian Watson
column5: always good service
column6: our go to! Mm mm veggie pot stickers and crunchy noodles are a must.'

author: Mike Ipp
column5: charged me more than my meal somehow
column6: and were rude when I called and asked to confirm my order because he didn't give me a receipt. For delivery."

author: Melanie Tam
text: "I decided to order a lunch special from here one Friday afternoon
column5: when another nearby Chinese takeout place I was about to order from was going to charge me extra for their fried rice
column6: AND made their food with celery. That was a no for me.\n\nOverall
column7: the food was pretty OK. I ordered chicken in garlic sauce with pork fried rice
column8: with a side of hot and sour soup. Their mushrooms taste a bit weird
column9: but that's not a deal breaker for me. Would probably order from here again - hold the mushrooms."

author: Jeremy Saxon
text:
'WHAT ARE YOU EVEN SERVING????
My wife and I ordered two different chicken entrees from this place. When we received our order (an hour and 15 minutes later) we were shocked and appalled by what we were being served. We cut into both entrees and could not find one piece of meat....seriously not even the $1 up charge white meat that I paid for. (What other color chicken are you serving?) The "chicken" was composed of fats and additives that were unidentifiable. We were however able to easily see there was zero chicken present. When we called the restaurant to complain the gentlemen who answered the phone stopped us mid sentence to tell the other workers what we were saying. What has happened to customer service these days??? After the phone was passed around a man finally said "All of our chicken is like this...everyone loves it." I asked who is everyone and are they human? Do not waste your time or energy with this place...if you have a go to restaurant stick with it and don't venture out. I'm going to sit these meals outside for the animals to eat tonight.

PS:I did not see a negative star rating I could choose which is why they are even getting 1 star.'

author: Juan Antigua
column5: one of the worst places I've been to. No wonder it's always empty most of the time. The staff and owners are extremely RUDE. Never again

author: Kathryn Thiele
text: "It's my go-to place when ordering sushi/ bento boxes at the office! The delivery man is always so excited when he gets here. Quick delivery and cheap food. Best sushi I've had in Hoboken so far."

author: Melissa Ardito
text: 'Ordered delivery and this is the second time that they sent the wrong item and then give you a hard time when you call. Will NEVER waste my time or money with this place again!'

author: Bree K
text: "The food here is really good and is cheap. It usually comes out pretty fast as well. Has a nice view of the street
column5: big window in front. I've been here a few times and I've never had problems with the food. Wait staff is nice
column6: but I've never seen the place super busy."
